channel.title: Webflow Spring IntelliJ JSF on Oliver Wehrens
channel.description: Recent content in Webflow Spring IntelliJ JSF on Oliver Wehrens

item.title: How to refactor Spring Webflow variables in your JSF pages with IntelliJ IDEA
item.description: We are using JSF, Facelets and Spring Webflow in the product I’m currently working on. What bugged me for some time already was that when we started to refactor the domain and the corresponding dto’s the GUI was a problem since the variables which get pulled out of the webflow are just string declarations. I had to go to each xhtml file and change the code to reflect the access to the new properties.
